content.question: Daniel Webster’s address to the Senate in 1830 in reply to Senator Hayne is best remembered for its

choices.label: attack on the Tariff of Abominations
defense of the principle of national union
assertion of the idea of States’ rights
apology for New England’s disloyalty in the War of 1812

content.answer: defense of the principle of national union

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
